tags.name: vaadin-details
tags.description:
`<vaadin-details>` is a Web Component creating an expandable panel
similar to `<details>` HTML element.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `<vaadin-details>` is a Web Component creating an expandable panel
 * similar to `<details>` HTML element.
 *
 * @element vaadin-details
 *
 * @slot - Slot fot the collapsible details content.
 * @slot summary - Slot for the summary content.
 *
 * @attr {Boolean} focused - Set when the element is focused.
 * @attr {Boolean} focus-ring - Set when the element is focused using the keyboard.
 *
 * @csspart toggle - The element used as indicator, can represent an icon.
 * @csspart summary-content - The wrapper for the slotted summary content.
 * @csspart summary - The element used to open and close collapsible content.
 * @csspart content - The wrapper for the collapsible details content.
 *
 * @fires opened-changed - Fired when the `opened` property changes.
 */

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: Set when the element is focused.

attributes.name: focus-ring
attributes.description: Set when the element is focused using the keyboard.

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: When true, the panel content is expanded and visible

properties.name: opened
properties.description: When true, the panel content is expanded and visible

slots.description: Slot fot the collapsible details content.

cssParts.name: content
cssParts.description: The wrapper for the collapsible details content.

cssParts.name: summary
cssParts.description: The element used to open and close collapsible content.

cssParts.name: summary-content
cssParts.description: The wrapper for the slotted summary content.

cssParts.name: toggle
cssParts.description: The element used as indicator, can represent an icon.
